title: Print, "Hunger on Wheels, New York Subways Advertising Co., Inc.", ca. 1949
signed: Signed in black, left center: E. McKnight Kauffer
inscribed: Verso, description of Kauffer and this particular commission.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Head in three-quarter profile of a man wearing a pince-nez, a black fedora, and blue bowtie against a mustard yellow background. A tomato at left within a box. In black text: HUNGER ON WHEELS / [in gray:] Showing[...] Advertising.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Hunger on Wheels, New York Subways Advertising Co., Inc.", ca. 1949.
ca. 1949. Lithograph on coated paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-609.
